}}'Mr Jones of Manor Farm' is a fictional character in George Orwell's
allegorical novel [[Animal Farm]]. Jones is an allegory for Tsar Nicholas II.
Jones is overthrown by the animals of his farm, who represent Bolshevik and
liberal revolutionaries.
categories: Fictional characters based on real people
